alert.note: Alert for Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 8:18PM AST until February 05 at 9:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM AST SUNDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following, Dorado, Toa Baja, Vega Alta and Vega Baja. * WHEN...Until 215 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. It will take several hours for all the water from these storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 816 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 5 and 10 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja
